contentfulSermon.title: Acts: Part 12 - Open Doors... kind of

fields.notesFormatted:
Acts 13-14

  1. We are all called to be a light.

    Matthew 5:14

    Phillipians 2:14-15

  2. Create opportunities, not conflict.

    1 Corinthians 9:19

  3. We should expect opposition.

    Romans 8:17

    1 Corinthians 16:8-9

  4. Don't barge down a door that God hasn't opened.

    Matthew 10:14

    Matthew 7:6
